Translations.Text: vy otrymaly novynu feuding lyudy shcho pidkralysya u yoho sanctuary

Koly vony vnesly yoho prymishchennya, vin buv perelyakanyy. Vony skazaly, "Ne mayutʹ strakha. My feuding z odyn odnym, ta my shukayemo vashoho spravedlyvoho vyroku. Ne nepravylʹni ny, ta keruyutʹ namy u pravi shlyakh
Tsey brat shakhty volodiye dev'yanosta dev'yatʹma baranom, v toy chas, yak ya volodiyu odnym baranom. Vin zakhoche zmishaty moho barana z yoho, ta prodovzhuyetʹsya do tysku meni

Vin skazav, "Vin buty nespravedlyv do vas prosyachy shchob ob'yednaty vashoho barana z yoho. Naybilʹsh lyudy kotri ob'yednuyutʹ yikhni vlasnistʹ stavlyatʹsya odyn odnoho nespravedlyvo, krim tsykh khto vvazhayutʹ ta robota righteousness, ta tsey tak." Piznishe, David dyvuvavsya yakshcho vin zrobyv pravo vyrok. Vin podumav shcho my vyprobovuvaly yoho. Vin todi blahav yoho Lorda dlya forgiveness, uklonyvsya vnyz, ta kayavsya
My prostyly yoho u tsiy materiyi. My harantuvaly yomu pozytsiyu chesti z namy, ta krasyvoyi abode

O David, my zrobyly vam liniyku na zemli. Tomu, vy budete pryymaty rishennya sered lyudey equitably, ta ne sliduyete za vashoyu personalʹnoyu dumkoyu, lest tse vidvodytʹ vas z shlyakhu BOHA. Bezsumnivno, tsey khto zbyvayutʹsya z shlyakhu shlyakh BOHA zaznayutʹ suvoroho retribution dlya toho, shchob zabuvaty Denʹ Rozrakhunku
My ne utvoryly nebesa ta zemlyu, ta vse mizh nymy, marno. Takyy yavlyaye soboyu myslennya tsykh khto disbelieve. Tomu, prykroshchi do tsykh khto disbelieve; vony postrazhdayutʹ u Pekli

my Budemo obrobyty tsi khto vvazhayutʹ ta Bude pryvesty spravedlyve zhyttya tomu shcho my obroblyayemo tsi khto zdiysnyuyutʹ zlo na zemli? My budemo obrobyty spravedlyvyy tomu shcho my stavymosʹ bezputnyy
Tse ye svyate pysannya shcho my poslaly vnyz do vas, shcho vmiye svyashchenni mozhlyvo vony viddzerkalyuyutʹ na yoho virshakh. Tsey khto volodiyutʹ rozvidkoyu vizʹme uvahu
David my harantuvaly Solomon; harnyy ta slukhnyanyy sluzhbovetsʹ
odyn denʹ vin stav preoccupied z krasyvymy kinʹmy, do nochi vpav
Vin todi skazav, "ya otrymav nasolodu vid materialʹnykh rechey bilʹsh nizh ya otrymav nasolodu vid obozhnyuyuchoho moho Lorda, do sontsya znyk
Prynosyatʹ yim nazad." (Shchob braty uchastʹ u torhakh proshchannya,) vin styrav yikhni nohy ta shyyi
My takym chynom stavymo Solomon do testu; my blahoslovlyaly yoho z prostorym materialʹnym bahat·stvom, ale vin steadfastly pidkoryvsya
Vin skazav, "Miy Lord, probachayutʹ meni, ta harantuyutʹ meni tsaryuvannya nikoly ne dosyahnute budʹ khto shche. Vy yavlyayete soboyu Nadavacha subsydiyi
My (vidpovidaly yoho molytvu ta) zdiysnyuvav viter u yoho rozporyadzhenni, llyuchomu doshchi de zavhodno vin zakhotiv
Ta chorty, budynok ta pirnannya
Inshi buly rozmishcheni u yoho rozporyadzhenni
Tse ye nashe zabezpechennya do vas; vy mozhete daty velykodushno, abo mozhete utrymaty, bez mezh
Vin zasluzhyv pochesnu pozytsiyu z namy, ta dyvovyzhnu abode
Pam'yatayutʹ nashu Robotu sluzhbovtsya: vin zaklykav na yoho Lorda, chort afflicted meni z neharazdamy ta bolem
Straykuyutʹ zemlya z vashoyu nohoyu. Vesna dastʹ vam likuyuchyy ta napiy
My restavruvaly yoho rodynu dlya nʹoho; dvichi yak bahato. Takyy nashe myloserdya; reminder dlya tsykh khto volodiyutʹ rozvidkoyu
Zaraz, vy budete mandruvaty zemlya ta bude propoviduvaty povidomlennya, fulfill vasha zastava." My znayshly yoho steadfast. Shcho harnyy sluzhbovetsʹ! Vin buv submitter
Pam'yatayutʹ takozh nashykh sluzhbovtsiv Abraham, Isaac, ta Jacob. Vony buly vynakhidlyvi, ta ovolodily zorom
My podaruvaly yikh velyke blahoslovennya: obiznanistʹ U maybutnʹomu
Vony buly vybrani, dlya vony buly sered naybilʹshoho spravedlyvyy
Zapam'yatayutʹ Ismail, Elisha, ta Zal-Kifl; sered naybilʹshoho spravedlyvyy
Tse ye reminder: spravedlyvyy zasluzhyly dyvovyzhnu dolyu
park Eden vidkryye yikhni bramy dlya nykh
Rozslablyayutʹsya tam, vony budutʹ davatysya bahato riznovydiv fruktiv ta napoyu
